mangan

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • mangan.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the full logic of each robot. It only keeps the information that every robot can know: relative position of other robots, and own speed, direction, etc. Also keeps distance traveled and mangan collected by the robot, as well as max speed. joinDistance and escapeDistance are two variable parameters which empower alg1 and alg2 at big and short distances respectively. As the robots only move after all of them have calculated their new position, we differentiate the method think (algs calculation) and the method moving (applying future position). All the calculations are done by relative positions of the neighbors, provided by the Simulator.getNeighbors method

      Think gets the relative coordinates of the neighbors and calculates three ways of future movement following PSO algorithms of cohesion (alg1), separation (alg2) and alignment (alg3) explained in each of them.

      • think

        public Coordinates think(java.util.List<Coordinates> neighbors,
                         double weight1,
                         double weight2,
                         double weight3)
        Think gets the relative coordinates of the neighbors and calculates three ways of future movement following PSO algorithms of cohesion (alg1), separation (alg2) and alignment (alg3) explained in each of them. A weight for each algorithm is given by the Simulator.
        Parameters:
        neighbors - a List<> of all the neighbor robots.
        weight1 - strength of algorithm one.
        weight2 - strength of algorithm two.
        weight3 - strength of algorithm three.
        Returns:
        the new Coordinate object for the future position.

      • move

        public Coordinates move()
        The next movement of the robot is set from future to past, it returns the future to the simulator, and keeps track of the total distance traveled by the robot.
        Returns:
        the future position of the robot.

      • addMangan

        public void addMangan(double mangan)
        Keeps track of the amount of mangan collected by the robot.
        Parameters:
        mangan - amount of total mangan.
